detail_desc: Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in marled cotton jersey with a collar, no buttons and slits in the sides.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a grandad collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar and cuffs.
Swim shorts in a patterned weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details. Slightly looser fit with an extra-high waist, button fly and straight legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Sandals in imitation leather with narrow straps that tie around the ankle and a braided jute trim around the soles and heels. Imitation leather insoles and gently fluted soles.

Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with an embroidered-weave back, seamed neckline, a yoke with a flounce at the back, long, cuffed raglan sleeves and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Trainers in imitation leather with a padded edge, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Suede ankle boots with a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and chunky soles. Heel approx. 5 cm.

Non-wired, push-up halterneck bra in microfibre with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Fastening at the back of the neck with an adjustable tie and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Cropped, fitted top in cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps.

Jacket in patterned cotton twill with a soft, brushed finish. Collar, concealed press-studs down the front, flap chest pockets, side pockets, a drawstring at the waist and a press-stud at the cuffs. Unlined.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs that finish just above the knees with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Long-sleeved blouse in a viscose weave with an opening with a button at the back of the neck and a flounce at the hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Mobile phone bag in nylon. Adjustable shoulder strap with a plastic buckle at each end, and a zip at the front with a tab and practical eyelet. Lined. Size 12.5x17.5 cm.
Alice bands in different designs. One in imitation leather with a bow, and one glittery.
High-waisted shorts in superstretch twill with a zip fly and button, back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Fabric-covered plastic Alice bands.
V-neck jumper in a double knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders and a straight hem with short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.

Body with a super push-up bra in lace with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening and cut-out section at the back. Lined gusset with concealed press-studs and a string back.
Non-wired bra in microfibre and lace with moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and a button fly. Two pairs in flannel and one in chambray.

Knee-length, V-neck nursing dress in soft jersey with a sewn-in wrapover at the front and narrow, elasticated seam at the waist with a decorative tie. Practical inner top for easier nursing access. Unlined.

Maxi dress in an airy cotton weave with narrow shoulder straps, a double-layered bodice at the front and a concealed zip in one side. Gathered seam under the bust, wide ties at the back, a wide skirt and a large flounce at the hem.

Boxy jacket in cotton denim with a collar and buttons down the front. Low dropped shoulders, wide puff sleeves with pleats and cuffs with a concealed press-stud. Diagonal front pockets and flap chest pockets with a concealed press-stud.
Short, 5-pocket skirt in washed, stretch denim with worn details, a zip fly and button, a slit at the back and a frayed, raw-edge hem.
Dance leotard in glossy jersey with short cap sleeves, a ballerina neckline with gathers at the top, a wide flounce at the hips and a lined gusset.
V-neck blouse in an airy weave with a pleated yoke front and back, long sleeves with an opening and ties at the cuffs, and a straight-cut hem.
Zip-through hoodie in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Straight-cut dress in sturdy jersey with 3/4-length sleeves and front pockets. Unlined.
Top in cotton sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Knitted jacket with a soft thermal fleece lining, stand-up collar and small appliqué at the top. Zip down the front, side pockets and a contrasting colour jersey trim around the pockets, cuffs and hem.
Textured swimsuit with a flounce around the neckline and down the shoulder straps at the back. Lined front.
Short. sleeveless dress in sturdy jersey with a V-neck at the front and concealed zip at the back. Fitted bodice and a bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
Short satin nightslip with a V-neck, frills at the top and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Short, tiered skirt in a patterned cotton weave with wide smocking at the waist. Unlined.
Jacquard-knit slippers with a hook and loop fastening at the back of the shaft, soft pile linings and soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
Hat in soft, fine-knit organic cotton with ears at the top, embroidery on the front and a ribbed trim with ties. Lining in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Nightdress in soft modal jersey with a V-neck and a contrasting colour lace trim at the top, under the bust and at the hem. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy weave with a collar, chest pocket, buttons down the front and a tie-front hem.
Fully lined, printed swimsuit with small frills at the side of the hems.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Suede slides with covered block heels. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 6.5 cm.
Set containing earrings and a two-strand necklace in metal with round sparkly stone pendants. Length of earrings 4.2 cm. Length of necklace 37.5-45 cm.
Longer jacket in washed denim with hard-worn details, a collar and buttons down the front and at the cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets and a raw-edge hem.
Padded jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Stand-up collar, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and a zipped inner pocket. Polyester filling. Lined.
Slightly shorter jumper in a soft double knit with a round neckline, dropped shoulders, long balloon sleeves with close-fitting ribbing at the cuffs, and a ribbed hem.

Two-button jacket in a cotton weave with stretch. Notch lapels, a chest pocket, welt front pockets and two inner pockets. Long sleeves with decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
T-shirt in organic cotton jersey with long raglan sleeves in a contrasting colour and press-studs at the back of the neck.
Brazilian briefs in lace and mesh with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Three-strand metal necklace, one chain decorated with plastic beads. Adjustable length 35-42.5 cm.
Slipover in a soft cotton knit with a V-neck and ribbed hem.
Short skirt in crinkled jersey with concealed elastication at the waist. Unlined.
Wide, double-layered hairband in soft cotton jersey.
Glittery metal hairclips. Length 5 cm.
V-neck blouse in a viscose weave with buttons at the top, 3/4-length sleeves and a rounded hem with short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
High-waisted leggings in sturdy cotton jersey. Visible elastic waistband with a text motif.
Short dress in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, side pockets, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fitted vest top in stretch cotton jersey.

Ankle-length suit trousers in airy linen with a hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets and tapered legs with creases. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Set with 12 hair elastics and 10 metal hair clips. Length of hair clips 4 cm.
Round earrings in embossed metal. Length approx. 3.5 cm.
Knee-length dress in a viscose crêpe weave with a round neckline and an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Short, flared sleeves and a smocked seam under the bust. Unlined.
Sleeveless dress in sequined tulle with a concealed zip at the back, seam at the waist and flared skirt in a double layer of tulle. Jersey lining.
Soft, non-wired silk bra with lace, lined cups and adjustable spaghetti straps. Lace-covered elastic at the hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Boots in imitation suede with faux fur linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Metal rings in various designs.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with print motif on the front, a jersey-lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Joggers in soft velour with a motif at the top, elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Calf-length dress in a crêpe weave with a round neckline, an opening and covered button at the back of the neck, and long sleeves. Relaxed fit with a gathered seam at the waist and hem. Unlined.
Fine-knit knee socks in a soft cotton blend.
5-pocket jeans in stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and straight legs with good room for movement over the thighs and knees.
Skirt in sequin-embroidered tulle with a glittery elastic waistband. Lined.
Block-coloured jersey T-shirt in a soft cotton blend.

Patterned set with a top in soft jersey and shorts and a sun hat in a cotton weave. Top with short, flounced sleeves, a chest pocket and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Shorts with an elasticated waist and elasticated hems. Lined sun hat with ties under the chin. Width of brim 4.5 cm.
Pyjama bottoms in jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Briefs in a cotton blend with an elasticated waist and lined gusset. One pair with an appliqué on the front.
Baby Exclusive. Tights in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist. The cotton content of the tights is organic.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, and narrow hems.
